text: Paul Konrad Muller (born 11 March 1923 in Neuchâtel, died 2 September 2016 in Tivoli, Lazio) was a Swiss character actor. He was known for his roles in Journey to Italy (1954), Nightmare Castle (1965) and Vampyros Lesbos (1971). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1923 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Swiss actors Category:People from Neuchâtel
title: Paul Muller (actor)
